name: Don't Go Into The Light (Jaco van Hemert, SkyyStorm)
name_original: Don't Go Into The Light (Jaco van Hemert, SkyyStorm)
description:
A platformer where you must continue to ascend or be engulfed by the light, which follows you every 10 seconds.

Find areas of peace, where you can breathe for a moment, before resuming your desperate fight against death.
But remember to collect all the memories on the way, or you will be unable to enter the safe zones.

A Jam entry for Ludum Dare.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/dont-go-into-the-light

Controls

  • <- -> or A D: Move left or right
  • Space or Z: Jump
  • Escape: Open Menu, Go Back
  • Space or Enter: Confirm

If the bloom is too bright for you, you can switch it to a less bright version in the options.

Credits

Coding, Design

- Carel van Hemert

- Jaco van Hemert

Level Design, Art, Writing
